titles.title: District of Columbia Juror Pay Parity Act

To amend title 11, District of Columbia Official Code, to provide that grand and petit jurors serving in the Superior Court of the District of Columbia shall receive fees and expenses at the same rates paid to grand and petit jurors appearing in the district courts of the United States.
District of Columbia Juror Pay Parity Act

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Oversight and Government Reform.

bill.summary:
District of Columbia Juror Pay Parity Act
This bill provides that grand and petit jurors serving in the Superior Court of the District of Columbia must receive fees and expenses equivalent to those provided to jurors serving in the U.S. district courts.
